comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b9) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b9
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b9) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b9

Attached screenshots show how the GameFly web pages should display under IE and show incorrect display with FF 4.0b9.  This is a change from 4.0b8 where things displayed correctly.

Reproducible: Always
comments.author: williamsca@process.com
comments.creator: williamsca@process.com
